import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import PostImg from "./PostImg"; function Profile({edit,props,del}) { const[ipost,newpost]=useState({ username:props.username, pimg:"", action:"ipost" }); function logout() { window.location.reload(); } const[img2,newimg2]=useState("my_img/profile_db.webp") useEffect(() => { if(props.img2 ==="") { }else { newimg2( props.Profile_img ); } }, [props]); console.log(props); return ( <>

) function imgs(e) { const file = e.target.files[0]; console.log( e.target.files[0]) newpost(function(pre){ return{ username:pre.username, pimg:file, action:pre.action } }) console.log(ipost); }; } export default Profile;
